postActions.description: Create the solution file and add the project.

manualInstructions.text: Run manually: dotnet new sln --name {Your Solution Name}

postActions.description: Add all projects to the solution.

args.args: /c "dotnet sln add src/Api/_solutionName_placeholder_.Api.csproj && dotnet sln add src/Application/_solutionName_placeholder_.Application.csproj && dotnet sln add src/Core/_solutionName_placeholder_.Core.csproj && dotnet sln add src/Infrastructure/_solutionName_placeholder_.Infrastructure.csproj && dotnet sln add tests/UnitTests/_solutionName_placeholder_.UnitTests.csproj && dotnet sln add tests/IntegrationTests/_solutionName_placeholder_.IntegrationTests.csproj"

manualInstructions.text: Run manually: dotnet sln add src/Api/{Your Solution Name}.Api.csproj && dotnet sln add src/Application/{Your Solution Name}.Application.csproj && dotnet sln add src/Core/{Your Solution Name}.Core.csproj && dotnet sln add src/Infrastructure/{Your Solution Name}.Infrastructure.csproj && dotnet sln add tests/UnitTests/{Your Solution Name}.UnitTests.csproj && dotnet sln add tests/IntegrationTests/{Your Solution Name}.IntegrationTests.csproj
